speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: SCENE V. Fields without the town.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO in his own habit, and FRIAR PETER

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: These letters at fit time deliver me

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Giving letters

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The provost knows our purpose and our plot.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The matter being afoot, keep your instruction,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And hold you ever to our special drift;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Though sometimes you do blench from this to that,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: As cause doth minister. Go call at Flavius' house,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And tell him where I stay: give the like notice

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To Valentinus, Rowland, and to Crassus,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And bid them bring the trumpets to the gate;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But send me Flavius first.

speaker: FRIAR PETER
text_entry: It shall be speeded well.

speaker: FRIAR PETER
text_entry: Exit

speaker: FRIAR PETER
text_entry: Enter VARRIUS

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I thank thee, Varrius; thou hast made good haste:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Come, we will walk. There's other of our friends

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Will greet us here anon, my gentle Varrius.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt
